nodes.text: Toxxun was the name of a massive narvaxx that was infected with the rakghoul plague during a resurgence of the plague on Corellia. It resided in the Coronet City until it was killed by individuals working for the Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization.
Toxxun appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as a World Boss during the Rakghoul Resurgence on Corellia, a recurring World Event.
